attributes.action: allow people to a No Confidence vote in the Cabinet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Telegraph speakers' corner has opened a blog on whether It is time for Alistair Darling to resign. 

I feel this is unfair as detailed under my post as I consider the Govt., namely the Cabinet to be the ones collectively incompetent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
